reviewText:
These people wonder why their farm is failing. Maybe it's because all they do is bang all day long when they should be working on it, They switch partners more often than a gaggle of crackheads at a square dance.

These old softcore films are a lot of fun, and nowadays unique with their slow foreplay, and the even more rare sighting of the now extinct pubic hair.
I gave this a four star rating. It was a good buy and completely as described. Storyline was good for this type of movie.

This movie was really...stupid. I guess if you really like softcore porn, this would be perfect, since that's what it is. But keep in mind, it doesn't show "anything"; it's like watching naked people make out, and that's it. It was fun to watch and laugh at with my friends, with the bad acting and all.

This is a very good softcore video from Playboy/Image. Plot? The city girl visits her friend's farm, which the bank is threatening to foreclose on, they need a good rain, evil development company, blah, blah, blah. The reason this farm is failing should be obvious. First, it only has five employees. Second, the first reason doesn't matter anyway, because everyone's too busy having sex with each other to do any work.

The sex however is great. The running time clocks in at 1:46 and there are thirteen sex scenes, although a couple of those are pretty short. Twelve are boy/girl pairings and one girl/girl. There's music playing during the scenes, but you can still hear the sounds of the performers. And except for the two shortest scenes (which are "fantasy segments"), all the scenes carry through to completion without any annoying interruptions.

The girl/girl scene is Monique Parent and Lauren Hays (and a bottle of baby oil) and is very good. Lauren Hays is in five of the other scenes. Monique Parent is in two of them. Allison Thomas-Miller has three scenes and Keri Crawford has two. All of these women are knockouts and all give great performances. Although Lauren and Monique were the stars, I thought Keri stole the show. She's a beautiful blond with a great body and some very sexy tan lines.

There are a lot of different locations and props used: the hood of a car, a boat dock by the lake, an outdoor shower, a barn with chains hanging from the rafters. About half the scenes are outdoors and the rest indoors.

Excellent softcore and very easy to recommend.

I'm a big fan of Monique Parent, and as usual, she doesn't dissappoint. The plot is simple (just how it should be for films like these). Big city girl rescues a failing winery, and along the way everyone gets naked and does everyone. In short, it's perfect. As with all of the Playboy Eros titles, the girls are hot and the action is grand. Watch the unrated version for some extra sizzle.
